Toothbrush as a gardening tool: Toothbrushes can be used to clean the small spaces between plants, remove dirt and debris from the soil, or even as a tool to help with plant propagation.
Toothbrush as a beauty tool: Toothbrushes can be used to apply makeup, such as lipstick or eyeshadow, or to help with nail care, such as cleaning under the nails or removing polish.
Toothbrush as a dental tool: Toothbrushes can be used to clean the teeth of pets, such as dogs or cats, or to help with oral hygiene for people with limited dexterity.
Toothbrush as a kitchen tool: Toothbrushes can be used to clean small, hard-to-reach areas in the kitchen, such as the crevices of a blender or the small spaces between the keys of a coffee maker.
Toothbrush as a musical instrument: Toothbrushes can be used to create unique sounds and rhythms when played with other objects, such as bottles or cans.
